verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Erigiyuntive Yehovaa yesukristunandu nannu erigi bhoomi punaadulu veyakamunde aakasamu sahaa lekunnappude ilaparvatamulu nilavakamunde kanabadu pratidiyu lekunnapude erigi yuntive{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nirnayinchitive Yehova Yesu kristunandu nannu nirna paramuna kootamu jarugakamunde rakshana veluguku raakunnappude prayaschittapu balikakunnapude Yesu roopamila nerpadanapude nirna yinchitive{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peruna pilchitive Yehova Yesu kristunandu nannu peruna cheta aadamunu cheyakamunde Hanoku neeto naduvakamunde Novahunu rakshimpakamunde pitrudabramunu piluvakamunde peruna pilichitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neetiga tirchitive Yehova Yesukristu nandu nannu neetiga garbamulo ne kalugakamunde kaalaparimiti kaakunnappude katika chikati kakunnappude Nirdevudanai nenundagane neetiga tirchitive{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahima parachitive Yehova Yesukristunandu nannu mahima Tejomayamuga diviraajyamuna Doota ganambulu pritiga pogada Tarugani nityatandri mahimatomahima Rupudagu mariya sutunito mahima parachitive{/lang-eng}
